content.question: Has any of the information about the adultery come from another person?
content.description: The court needs to know if any of this information is second hand.
content.informationDetailsQuestion: Which information was given to you?

reasonForDivorceAdulterySecondHandInfo.required: Select whether you found out these details yourself, or if any of them came from another person.
